description:
The long awaited championship match between Athena and Hikaru occurs.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Ailes de l`ange ! Guidez-nous Hikaru et moi !
Angels Wings! Pull Me and Hikaru Together
Mögen die Schwingen der Engel mich und Hikaru ans Ziel tragen!
Que As Asas De Um Anjo Guiem A Mim E A Hikaru!
Tenshi no Ysubasa yo! Watashi to Hikaru o Izanatte
天使の翼よ! 私とヒカルをいざなって
